forumNotes.author: 0ffer
forumNotes.content: From this floppy you can boot CD (for old BIOS only) on computers that cannot use a bootable CD-ROM or by press and hold down CTRL booting to DOS prompt. No mentioned in Old forum [Boot cdroms from a floppy](http://z3.invisionfree.com/Boot_Land/index.php?act=ST&f=12&t=40 "External link") file BOOTSECT.cdr renamed to boot.cdr \& start by modified boot sector from Ranish partition manager.Working with virtual floppy "vfloppy.exe". [Dual boot](http://www.multiboot.ru/files.htm "External link")
